선택형 문항 추가 가이드 텍스트: Click here to add an example.
대시보드 최근 생성된 설문 설명: This shows up to 20 surveys recently created.
설문 상세 접근권한 없음 메시지: You are not a respondent or you cannot view the result.
설문 대상자 추가 안내 메시지: Select a user to be a target.
설문 대상부서 추가 안내 메시지: Select a department to be targets.
참조자 추가 안내 메시지: Select a user you would like to assign as an observer.
설문 결과 열람 가능 안내 메시지:
※ If the survey results are set to Public, the graph results will be released.
※ Results documents can be downloaded regardless of whether the survey results are released.
설문 참여자 결과 공개 안내메시지: ※ This sets whether respondents can view the result.
설문 등록자 설정 안내 메시지: ※ If you would like to let respondents know where this survey was created, enter the department name or organization name. eg) HR, Admin Center
설문 제목 초과 오류 메시지: You can enter up to 64 characters into a title.
텍스트 길이 검증 오류 메시지: You can enter at least {{min}} characters and up to {{max}} characters.
문항 등록 0개 초과 메시지: You can add up to {{arg1}} examples.
배치 처리 오류 메시지:
An error has occurred while processing what you've requested.
Please try it again later.
설문 제출 확인 메시지: Would you like to submit it?
설문 응답 임시저장 확인 메시지: Would you like to save it?
설문 삭제 확인 타이틀: Would you like to delete it?
설문 삭제 확인 메시지: Note that once you delete a survey you cannot recover it.
미참여자에게 알림: A notify email will be sent to non-respondents.
필수질문 미응답 메시지:
You have not answered a required question.
Please answer all the required questions.
설문 시작 안내 메시지: Would you like to start it?
설문 중지 안내 메시지: Would you like to suspend it?
이전단계이동질문: Would you like to go back to the previous step?
이전단계이동경고:
If you go back,
Description and attachment(s) are not saved.
메일알림 설명: Go to Control Panel > Region and Language > Customize and set Digit Grouping Symbol as comma(,) if files are not properly displayed.
중지된 설문 안내문: The survey was suspended. You cannot respond it or view a result.
설문 작성 알림 설명: The survey will be started if you click 'OK'.
같은상태만선택: Please select survey of the same status.
완료된설문중지: You cannot suspend the completed survey.
준비중설문중지: You cannot suspend the survey in preparation.
임시저장설문중지: You cannot suspend the saved survey.
완료된설문진행: You cannot start the completed survey.
준비중설문진행: You cannot start the survey in preparation.
임시저장설문진행: You cannot start the saved survey.
준비중설문마감: You cannot finish the survey in preparation.
임시저장설문마감: You cannot finish the saved survey.
중지된설문마감: You cannot finish the suspended survey.
설문 마감 확인 타이틀: Would you like to finish the survey?
설문날짜확인: Please set the end of the survey again.
시작안내문구상세:
The guidance statement will be shown at the top of page before creating the survey.
The purpose of the survey or images can be inserted.
진행중 설문 수정 알림: The survey is suspended while editing the survey
설문 대상자 설정 안내 메시지: ※ If you exclude respondent from target list, the response is deleted as well.
설문 가져오기 설명:
You can copy a survey that is registered as a surveyor, reference.
However, you can copy only the surveys that are in progress or completed, and you can copy all the surveys that I have made.
설문 복사 가능 대상자 안내메시지: ※ The survey can be copied by the surveyor and the user who has set it as a reference.
설문을 복사하시겠습니까?: Do you want to copy this survey?
설문 복사 알림:
The selected survey will be saved temporarily and can be found in the list of surveys I have created.
The survey period changes based on the current date, and attachments, survey participants and references are not copied.
